reviews.title: Good value
reviews.review_text: I just needed a simple 4-port USB hub. This fit the bill, works as expected and it was hard to beat the price especially with free shipping. It also arrived sooner than expected.

reviews.title: Great for laptops
reviews.review_text: Unit is small, so easy to carry. Plus has about 16" cord so it won't get in the way. Using it for wireless keyboard/mouse and external speaker. Works good, no delays or shut-offs.

reviews.title: For under $4, you can't beat it!
reviews.review_text: I accidentally ruined 2 ports for my laptop. This item is perfect for restoring ample ports.

reviews.title: Awesome little USB hub
reviews.review_text: Everything worked great on it. Really appreciated a few things about this device. 1. The cable on it has a decent bit of length. Lots of cheap hubs give you just a few inches of cable to work with. 2. Having three ports on the top. A lot easier for plugging in jump drives and the like since you just push them down, other hubs you have to pick the hub up because the ports are all on the side. 3. The ports are arranged "vertically" rather than "horizontally". You'll know what I'm talking about if you've ever had a usb device that was really wide and you had to unplug the adjacent ports for it to fit in. Shouldn't have that problem here - awesome!

reviews.title: Insten 4 Port USB Hub
reviews.review_text: You can't beat the price on this 4 port USB Hub. Apparently the electronic warehouse where this item came from is closing them out. I used this to attach a printer, mouse and keyboard all to a single USB port on my PC. The extra long cable is great so you can place it where you want it. Other USB hubs tend to have shorter cables and are not that easy to work with. For $ 2.79 you just cant beat the deal !! It's sweet and works great !!

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review_text: I am happy with this purchase. The fact that the hub serves as a charger and data port is a treat. I can have my flash drive at my fingertip rather than going down to plug it into the PC directly. So far everything connected to this device is working well.

reviews.title: Works perfectly - awesome value!
reviews.review_text: Not only did I receive this item a few days after placing my order - it shipped for FREE! At less than 4.00, it's a really awesome value. Consistently works properly as expected. Small and easily placed out of the way when in use. I highly recommend! PH Atlanta, GA

reviews.title: keep your money
reviews.review_text: this is a non-refundable product and unless you can find a driver for it for your computer, which I could not it will not work. was not damaged but a $6.00 piece of junk

reviews.title: Do Not Buy Unless You like Reconnecting It!
reviews.review_text: This extension port coninues to disconnect. I am constantly reinterting it. I wishe I had saved the box it came in because I am going to see if I can return it. I purchased it because the design allowed for usability of all ports ; however, the constant disconnection is quite annoying

reviews.title: 4-Port USB Hub
reviews.review_text: Great idea. Now I can use my printer, camera, keyboard, etc., without constantly removing one thing to use another !

reviews.title: it fits in the given space I have and
reviews.review_text: it works with a plug in every port. That's fine, does what it's sposed to. What more could I ask for $2.79 ??? Thanks, WalMart, for having stuff I can afford.

reviews.title: Insten 4-Port USB Hub.
reviews.review_text: Not a lot to evaluate on this basic USB extension hub. I couldn't pass-up adding another hub especially at this price. It works well and I'm quite satisfied so far.

reviews.title: USB Hub
reviews.review_text: This is the second of these devices that I have bought. Computers may have insufficient USB ports, and this device rectifies the situation in a cost-effective manner!

reviews.title: did not work as advertized
reviews.review_text: You have 4 USB ports. However, this doesn't work- I plugged in both keyboard and mouse and it worked. I then plugged in two memory sticks and they didn't work. net gain of 4 ports was effectively zero.

reviews.title: Very Satisfied
reviews.review_text: The Insten 4-Port USB Hub, Black, Is just what I was looking for, and needed. Great Price. Fast, free delivery. Plugged it right in, loaded my other devices. Works great. That's how all transactions should work. Thanks.

reviews.title: Constantly Disconnects.
reviews.review_text: terrible, the usbs only go about halfway in so they are sticking half way out, so they wobble, they dont snap in. because of this my connections are constantly disconnecting

reviews.title: Literally does not work
reviews.review_text: The hub is totally nonfunctional. It doesn't show up on the USB bus at all. I think there is supposed to be a power light, but it doesn't light. A waste of money and time and Walmart is making it difficult to return as it's defective.

reviews.title: Don't buy this and don't buy from eForCity
reviews.review_text: 1. This 4 port USB hub does not handle more than 2 items without problems... even if they are powered items (printers that don't draw power from the hub). 2. Postage is more than the item costs, and isn't waived when your cart is over $50 3. Returns required extensive documentation, including photos of the item, before eForCity will consider issuing an RMA so that you can pay to return it to them. 4. This is the second item I've purchased through Walmart from eForCity... both were poor quality. I won't buy anything from this vendor again... They give Walmart a bad rep.

reviews.title: Good for length
reviews.review_text: I needed a hub with a long chord. This was one of the only ones I could find for a decent price!

reviews.title: Insten 4-Port USB Hub
reviews.review_text: It works perfectly with my travel computer and is ideal for use with a separate USB powered video screen.

reviews.title: Broken Low Quality Garbage
reviews.review_text: Hardly works, it keeps disconnecting and reconnecting randomly like there is a short in it. Don't get this product.

reviews.title: Just ok...
reviews.review_text: The USB port that plugs into computer was messed up and doesn't always work. Fixed it to a certain extent but it shouldn't be my problem.

reviews.title: Pleased with this.
reviews.review_text: Exactly as advertised. Arrived early. Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Have been using it for a week.

reviews.title: Awful, waster of money
reviews.review_text: This product couldn't even charge my phone. When my phone wasn't plugged into the USB hub, the USB hub only supported a max of two items. This was a waste of money.

reviews.title: Did not work
reviews.review_text: Didn't work right out of the box. Walmart does not accept returns for this product (we were warned in the product description). Only out less than $5 though.

reviews.title: hub
reviews.review_text: This product works very well. I would buy it again.

reviews.title: INSTEN USB HUM
reviews.review_text: It does not work with one of my external drives. However, it works with the flash drives.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Will charge everything else but my cell phone

reviews.title: Awesome Clearance Price
reviews.review_text: Perfect, Perfect, Perfecto!!!

reviews.title: It didn't work. Wouldn't charge nothing
reviews.review_text: I wouldn't recommend this it wouldn't charge anything it was returned

reviews.title: waste of $7
reviews.review_text: did not work for chargeing or syncing my stuff

reviews.title: It is Right & Very Economic.
reviews.review_text: Very Good & Simple tool- 4 connectors enough. Thanks.

reviews.title: Insten 4 port USB Hub
reviews.review_text: works perfectly.5 bucks free shipping....

reviews.title: Malfunction Error
reviews.review_text: My laptop often does not recognize the hub and says it has malfuntioned. Dissapointed.

reviews.title: Great Product! Shipped Fast!
reviews.review_text: Great Product! Shipped Fast!

reviews.title: Works good
reviews.review_text: Only 1 drawback i noticed. When I plugged in 2 external hds, didn't recognize both.

reviews.title: Good product cord not long enough
reviews.review_text: Product is what I was looking for , but the cable cord is much shorter than anticipated.

reviews.title: Arrived busted
reviews.review_text: The item arrived clearly used, with a bent port.

reviews.title: Doesn't even work
reviews.review_text: Wouldn't waste the moneyâ€¦ isn't stable

reviews.title: Does exactly what I needed
reviews.review_text: I ordered this hub because I needed to have at least one top loading USB slot for my laptop's wireless adapter. This works perfectly and I am very pleased with it. The price was much less than I expected and the hub was shipped very fast. Great deal.

reviews.title: 4 port USB hub
reviews.review_text: This item did not work when I first connected it to my computer. It took several minutes for it to locate the necessary driver to work.Their shipping policy cost more then the item itself. If the item does not work, it is too costly to return. I will not deal with this company again.

reviews.title: bad
reviews.review_text: got it in the mail 1 day used it that afternoon the next day it would not work tried two or three times still would not work . put it in the trash. just glad it did not cost to much'

reviews.title: decent, depending on use
reviews.review_text: Product arrived on the early side of the expected date range. It seems to work well so far; however, I can't use it for my external hard drive....it keeps disconnecting from it. It does work for my mouse and keyboard so I have them plugged into it and have freed up my other ports for other things.

reviews.title: USB 4-port
reviews.review_text: I received the USB multi port accessory. The price was attractive because of a clearance sale, and the shipping was very fast. However, I have had bad performance from the device. The USB ports are erratic, and don't seem to work at times. The value of the item does not warrant a return. However, overall I have been most satisfied by the Walmart internet products service!

reviews.title: Did not work. Very cheap
reviews.review_text: This device did not work. Too cheap to send back.

reviews.title: Works like a charm
reviews.review_text: This works just great as long as only one source is being used at a time.

reviews.title: Did not work at all
reviews.review_text: Windows can't recognize this device. I heard a sound of connection but I did not see any device that it should to connect through that hub. Waste of money and efforts.

reviews.title: Istern 4 Port USB hub
reviews.review_text: This item works great for an older computer or laphone top. If your USB has a 3.0 port this will not work well for you. It is small and portable like my laptop.

It doesn't allow my Note 8 or my tab e or tab a to charger properly. I wouldn't suggest it for any reason. When tried to get a refund it would cost me more to get my money back then it did for me to purchase 4 of these things. They are pointless. Dont waste your time.

reviews.title: Don't waste your time.
reviews.review_text: I figured I was going to be disappointed when I got the product and the top of the package had already been opened. Super cheap feeling and one of the ports doesn't even work. Maybe it had been returned once for being broken but it's not even worth the hassle of returning for me. Save your time and money and find something else.

reviews.title: Good Cheap port
reviews.review_text: good unpowered port, will not run data & power for hungry equipment, but works great for data only

reviews.title: Short lived
reviews.review_text: This worked fine for a while then it slowly started to glitch. Intermittently, it stopped. I need to buy a new, better quality one.

reviews.title: Insten 4 Port Hub
reviews.review_text: Great value for the buck. Hub works perfectly and can fit in tight spots. You won't be disappointed with this hub.

reviews.title: Usb hub
reviews.review_text: Works great. Much cheaper than buying another laptop. Had damaged two sub poorts and got this , it fits in the only port left Now I can hook up other things

reviews.title: Great price, Poor Quality
reviews.review_text: This type of item was just what I needed to keep all my devices plugged. However, when I received it like many other reviews it did not work, it would connect and then lose connection or not work at all. I will be returning this item.

reviews.title: USB PORT, MULTI
reviews.review_text: You can never have to many ports, This works out great for all my gadgets I need to plug in to my computer, such as phone charger, head set, printer, wireless mouse & keyboard Ect.

reviews.title: USB Port
reviews.review_text: Please do not order this USB Port is cheap and it's very poor quality product. The manufacturer and Wal-Mart are not responsibility of the product. Do not order this product!!

reviews.title: Worked for two days.......sad to say.

Perfect solution to my cigarette lighter not working!!

reviews.title: Doesn't work
reviews.review_text: Worked for one day. Already had to replace it. Do not waste your money or time with this product...

reviews.title: It is what it is.
reviews.review_text: Seems like it has a shortage in it. Sometimes it works sometimes it doesnt. But you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: wast of time
reviews.review_text: two of the ports didn't work, since it was under 4 dollars, I didn't bother with a return, just threw it away. would never by another.

reviews.title: Insten hub
reviews.review_text: The price for the item is right, but the shipping charge should be combined with the other products.

reviews.title: great product
reviews.review_text: I liked it because it added more usb plugs to my desk top. The cord was just long enough. And the cost was outstanding.
I love the concept of having a multiple USB extender, but the fourth port on the devise does not work.

reviews.review_text: I didn't work. I tried to charge my I pad Mini with it. I charged it for at least 8 hours. It only charged it about 13%.

just what I needed to add extra USB ports to my laptop. I use it to run a wireless remote for presentations and a cooling fan.

reviews.title: HUB
reviews.review_text: I bought this hub to extend old laptop but it needs an outside power source to be strong enpugh to use on some items
It did exactly what I wanted it to-expands my hub inputs. Now I can use more devices than before. It's a nice thing to have.

reviews.title: Not good. See the product details.
reviews.review_text: The hubs are cheaply made with very thin plastic and some of the ports works and those that do work, work randomly.

reviews.title: Poor Product Quality
reviews.review_text: It is a bad hub, the peripherals connected in this hub are disconnected from the PC if the hub moves even if only a little, Insten has other Hubs much better for almost the same price. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.title: Useful item
